/* External links */ The official radio channel of Sathya Sai Baba and his books and publications websites have been added
/* Claims of miracles and clairvoyance */ The only book written with a more rationalistic observation of Baba by a Westerner is Sai Baba - The Man of Miracles.
/* Institutions, organizations and projects */ Added a new Service project under taken in Orissa during floods in 2008. Recently the news got published in Times of India
/* Institutions, organizations and projects */ This year one more Walk for Values took place in Phoenix.
